name: Shoot to 100
description:
you know how to make games, but you suck at drawings ... What do you do? Make a game of geometric shapes!

A game about a blue cube that decides to explore the world.

With a variety of 3 weapons, 12 power ups, 100 levels, 10 bosses, and a variety of enemies.(Coming soon)

Changelog:

04/24/2021:

Well the game had its first version released.
